msg: DISPATCH-95: Use containerName for container managemenet identity.

author: sarowe
msg: SOLR-4839: Set Jetty 9's new option to persist its temp directory (persistTempDirectory) - where the war is exploded - to true, so that the server/solr-webapp/ directory doesn't get deleted when Jetty shuts down gracefully (merged trunk r1650328)
